arts.ttl: Brentford v Aston Villa: how to watch, kick-off time, TV channels and streams
arts.sum: Aston Villa are preparing for their second Premier League game of 2025/26 and will face Brentford in their first fixture away from home. Villa look to follow up a timid point on opening day with all three on the road on Saturday afternoon at the Gtech Community Stadium in west London.
